summary: In a rest home for elderly people, a daughter reads her mother's diary. Soon events that are mentioned in the mother's diary begin to happen to the daughter.
cast: Jacki Kerin|John Jarratt|Alex Scott|Gerda Nicolson|Charles McCallum|Bernadette Gibson|Robert Ratti|Vince Deltito|Tommy Dysart|Debra Lawrance|Kristine Marshall|Simon Thorpe|David Allshorn|Alan Rowe|Matt Burns|Daphne Miller|Isobel Harley|Eunice Crimp|Irene Hewitt|Myrtle Woods|Vic Gordon|Peter Lord|Ernest Wilson|Bill Marr|John Bishop|Mitchell Faircloth|Sid Krasey|John Strahan|Nora Toohey
title: Angustia a flor de piel
